trading.LiquidationPrice: If price falls below this level, position may be liquidated.
trading.InterestAPR: Current annualised interest rate. This may change over time.
trading.Balance: Something about where balance is read from

lending.InterestAPR_BTC: Current annualised interest rate. Changes based on supply and demand.
lending.InterestAPR_USD: Current annualised interest rate. Changes based on supply and demand.
